title: Royal Bikana Caterers Rajputana-themed multi-page marketing site (frontend)

requirements.summary: Create SPA routing + responsive header navigation for Home, About Us, Services, Menu, Gallery, Contact with brand name/tagline.
acceptanceCriteria: All 6 pages are reachable via in-app navigation without full page reload.
Navigation collapses into a mobile menu on small screens.
Business name and tagline are visible in the header (or within the hero on Home) on initial load.

file_operations.description: Create the root app with client-side routing for Home, About Us, Services, Menu, Gallery, Contact and a shared layout wrapper (header/footer).

Implement responsive header with business name "ROYAL BIKANA CATERERS", tagline "Shahi Swad â€¢ Royal Andaaz", desktop nav, and mobile hamburger menu. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button / Sheet) to support accessible mobile navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create shared layout component that renders the SiteHeader, main content container, and footer across all pages.
Create Home page route component and wire into router.
Create About Us page route component and wire into router.
Create Services page route component and wire into router.
Create Menu page route component and wire into router.
Create Gallery page route component and wire into router.
Create Contact page route component and wire into router.
Ensure the app renders the new App router/layout and that global styling import points to the correct CSS file used for the Rajputana theme.

requirements.summary: Apply consistent premium Rajputana visual design (maroon/wine + gold, subtle patterns, crown/shield motifs), mobile-first and performant.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent color palette (maroon/wine + gold) and typography styling.
Royal motifs/patterns are present but subtle (do not reduce text readability).
All key sections are usable on mobile widths (320px+) with no horizontal scroll.
Page renders quickly with optimized assets (no uncompressed huge images).

file_operations.description: Update global theme tokens and base styles for maroon/wine background, gold accents, readable typography, and subtle pattern support; ensure mobile-first spacing/typography and avoid heavy/blocking assets.
Extend Tailwind theme with brand colors (maroon/wine + gold) and any needed utilities to keep styling consistent across pages.
Add generated seamless motif pattern tile as a static asset for subtle background texture usage across sections.
Add generated gold crown icon as a static asset for subtle royal motif usage.
Add generated gold shield icon as a static asset for subtle royal motif usage.
Add generated gold handi/cooking pot icon as a static asset for subtle culinary motif usage.
Add generated Royal Bikana logo as a static asset and use it in header/hero as needed.

requirements.summary: Implement Home page hero with required headings, CTAs to Contact/Menu, and a highlights section displayed as readable cards/tiles.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero shows the exact heading and subheading text.
"Book Catering" routes to Contact page and "Get Menu" routes to Menu page.
Highlights are displayed as a clearly readable set of cards/tiles with icons or ornaments.

file_operations.description: Add generated hero background texture as a static asset for the Home hero section.

Implement hero section using frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-royal-texture.dim_1920x1080.jpg, render exact required heading/subheading, and add CTA buttons that navigate to Contact and Menu. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button / Card) for premium CTAs and highlight tiles. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement About Us page with provided About content verbatim in premium, readable formatting.
acceptanceCriteria: About page displays the provided paragraph verbatim.
Content is styled for readability (line length, spacing) on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Render the provided About paragraph verbatim and apply premium, readable typography/layout (semantic headings, comfortable line length, mobile-first spacing).

requirements.summary: Implement Services page with the 8 requested services in an icon-based premium card/grid layout.
acceptanceCriteria: All 8 services appear with an icon each.
Layout adapts to 1 column on small screens and multiple columns on larger screens.

file_operations.description: Render all 8 services with an icon each and a responsive premium grid. Use shadcn-ui Card for consistent service tiles. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement Menu page with categorized sections, exact item lists, and an in-page category navigation for deep linking/scrolling.
acceptanceCriteria: All categories and items are present and spelled as provided.
Categories are clearly separated and easy to scan on mobile.
Menu page supports deep linking or scrolling to categories via a category list/tabs (in-page).

file_operations.description: Implement categorized menu sections with all items spelled exactly as provided; add an in-page category navigation (anchor links or tabs) that supports deep linking/scrolling and is mobile-friendly. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Tabs / Button) if appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement Gallery page with at least 8 themed placeholder images in a responsive grid and a modal/lightbox preview.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery page displays at least 8 placeholder images relevant to the listed themes.
Images are responsive and maintain aspect ratio.
Clicking a gallery image opens a larger preview (modal/lightbox) and can be closed easily on mobile.

file_operations.description: Add generated placeholder image for wedding catering setup.
Add generated placeholder image for live food counter.
Add generated placeholder image for royal food presentation.
Add generated placeholder image for wedding/party atmosphere.

Create a responsive gallery grid using the generated placeholder images (reused to reach 8+ tiles as needed) with maintained aspect ratio; implement lightbox/modal preview using shadcn-ui Dialog. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement Contact page details, WhatsApp CTA with prefilled message, and a validated contact form that submits to backend and shows success/failure without reload.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page shows both phone numbers and the location text clearly.
WhatsApp button opens WhatsApp (wa.me deep link) targeting one of the provided numbers with a prefilled inquiry message including Name, Event Type, and Event Date when available.
Form validates required fields (at minimum: Name and Mobile Number) and indicates errors inline.
On submit, inquiry is sent to the backend and persisted; UI shows a success confirmation without page reload.

file_operations.description: Render contact details (two phone numbers, location, WhatsApp note), add a "Book Now on WhatsApp" button that builds a wa.me link with prefilled message from current form values, and implement the contact form with inline validation + success/failure UI states. Use shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button components for consistent premium form styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a React hook that calls the backend capability submitContactForm via the existing actor (useActor) and returns mutation state for success/failure handling (no page reload).
Ensure actor usage is compatible with anonymous visitors for marketing-site lead submission (no login requirement) and that errors are surfaced cleanly to the UI.

requirements.summary: Add a premium footer across all pages with business info and social icons linking out to WhatsApp and Instagram placeholder.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on every page.
WhatsApp icon opens WhatsApp chat link.
If Instagram URL/handle is not provided, the link is clearly a placeholder and does not break navigation.

file_operations.description: Implement footer with business name, tagline, both phone numbers, location "Bikaner, Rajasthan", and social icons (Instagram + WhatsApp) linking out (WhatsApp to wa.me; Instagram placeholder). Use shadcn-ui Button for icon links if helpful. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire SiteFooter into the shared layout so it appears on every page.

requirements.summary: Implement basic on-page SEO (titles, meta descriptions, semantic headings) and incorporate provided keywords naturally while keeping performance-friendly assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page has a unique, relevant document title and meta description.
At least one page (Home and/or Services) includes the target keywords in visible copy in a natural way.
Pages use semantic structure (single H1 per page; appropriate H2/H3).
Lighthouse-style best practices are followed (compressed images, no blocking large assets).

Add semantic heading structure (single H1) and include at least some of the target keywords naturally in visible copy and/or meta description via useSeo.
